prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered crouched binding pose with chains of geometric patterns, chibi proportions with large translucent fluid Hexagonal head with unique hexagonal structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying time still. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal, mobius patterns, styled with Virtue time influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by blue and neutral grey inspired by wisdom fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and hexagonal emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like cup of understanding with triangular geometric patterns with time spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor PACASNA's profile: 'She who is unchanged by time', Aethyr ARN, Water element, Tarot The Devil, Sephirot Binah, Zodiac Capricorn, embodying the essence: 'In PACASNA's presence, time itself seems to stand still at an unmoving center a still-point of eternity about which the ages quietly wheel.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered crouched binding pose with chains of geometric patterns
visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent fluid Hexagonal head with unique hexagonal structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying time still
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal, mobius patterns, styled with Virtue time influences

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: cup of understanding with triangular geometric patterns
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'She who is unchanged by time'
profile_data.essence: In PACASNA's presence, time itself seems to stand still at an unmoving center a still-point of eternity about which the ages quietly wheel.
profile_data.angelic_role: Virtue of Eternal Stillness; governs abyssal wardens.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent water-crystal formation that simultaneously embodies stillness and infinite potential, representing the immutable nature of eternal consciousness within fluid transformation
profile_data.color_reasoning: Deep blue represents Binah's profound wisdom, water's depth, and Capricorn's structural integrity; silver-white signifies transcendence and the liminal space between material and spiritual realms
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structures echo water's molecular formation, fractals represent infinite recursive complexity, mobius symbolizes eternal continuity without beginning or end
